name: Maze Escape: Car Parking Lever
description:
Maze Escape: Car Parking Lever!!!
Be the puzzle solving champion by completing multiple mazes. Take circular override turns on a road track by thinking logically. Take part in challenging maze adventure with a hidden parking slot. Mostly parking games are very tough as parking a car or truck or any vehicle requires proper skills and that's why multi story car parking and parking plaza games are so close to real driving & parking the real car.
Features:
Enjoy modern car parking challenges with luxury different cars
Adventure parallel parking and multi-story parking
Enjoy Car parking in labyrinth 3d maze puzzle game free
Avoid hitting rocky obstacles while driving car
Realistic damage to track boundaries
